subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Derek Jeter, the Yankees’ captain, said Alex Rodriguez has the support of his teammates and defended his former manager, Joe Torre, for controversial statements in his new book, “The Yankee Years.”.
snippet: Derek Jeter, the Yankees’ captain, said Alex Rodriguez has the support of his teammates and defended his former manager, Joe Torre, for controversial statements in his new book, “The Yankee Years.”.
